Author: MissNietzsche
Text: I don't trust restaurant counts. Food preparers never follow serving sizes

Author: arabella_05
Text: beans are such a great filler food because they are so low in calories. rice is the same, a normal portion won't be too much of your caloric intake. i totally understand that feeling of fullness and also confusion at the fullness, since the calories weren't high. also remember your stomach 'adjusts' to getting smaller volumes of food as you restrict for long periods of time so it may be that. but have trust in the calories - it's science ! ðŸ’•
